title: Bitcoin small holder addresses hit all-time high, hint at widening user base
description:
Quick Take The Bitcoin (BTC) ecosystem is observing an intriguing trend, with an explosive rise in the number of addresses falling under the Plankton Cohort (addresses holding less than 0.01 BTC). This cohort serves as a crucial barometer to assess macro trends of growth or decline throughout market cycles. As per recent data, the address […]

The post Bitcoin small holder addresses hit all-time high, hint at widening user base appeared first on CryptoSlate.
